description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including rendering the puzzle grid, handling user interactions, and checking answers.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sorts data, sets up event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for each puzzle entry based on starting positions and orientations, and adds clues to the DOM.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the puzzle grid with input fields for each entry, assigns classes, and adds entry numbers.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input for an entry matches the correct answer and marks it as solved if correct.
